data.name: Multi Idle
data.detailed_description:
Multi Idle is an idle game that features Exploring, Adventuring, Hero's, Dungeons, Raids and many more in its own kind of idling way.

Multi Idle has a large focus on giving the player, the power to control how they play. Each rebirth unlocks more content and more ways to change the playstyle of your game. Revisit old strategy's reborn anew or focus heavily on a part of the game that you have been slacking on.

Characters
The game allows up to 3 characters to be played, Each character technically their own save file and game themselves. With some progress shared between your characters.

Explore, Adventure, Dungeon and Raids
Take your hero out and find new things, Delve into the depths, or fight a Boss! Everything has unique rewards, So make sure you do it all!

Modules and Quad-View
The game is split into modules, Allowing you to quickly switch between parts of the game as well as open up a quad-view to display up to 4 modules at a single time! Modules are the core parts of the game and each module focuses on specific category's of the game.

Customization
There are many Races, Advantages, Classes and Evolutions. Its explained by RACE. Choose your Race, Advantage and Class when rebirthing allowing customizable runs. Beware of Evolutions! They are secret conditions that only make you stronger! Try to discover and learn them all to make future runs easier!

data.short_description: Multi Idle is an idle game that features Exploring, Adventuring, Hero's, Dungeons, Raids and many more in its own kind of idling way. Get stuck in an endless loop of trying new things every time you play!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
